comments.html:
@Guilherme: thanks for the notice.

You might be using an old feed URL. I fixed that one as well to point to the new blog, and it's already updated.

If however you're using iTunes, it might take an extra day - I requested a refresh, but they work on their own glacial speed ;)
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html:
The whole feed is now up to date : ) Thank you Ivan.

P.S.: I’m using overcast on IOS.
comments.name: Guilherme

comments.html: It’s not grey market, it’s second hand. Vendors use grey market to associate it with the criminal black market. Please stop perpetuating this.
comments.name: Stavros

comments.html:
Ivan - I had same problems with the feed, now fixed.
